item.title: Help with this Error please!
item.dc:creator: @Pizz4_0wnz Pizz4 0wnz
item.description:
@Pizz4_0wnz wrote:

Help me!! i get an error when trying to add auto-casting…this is the error…

client.java:23118: cannot find symbol symbol : method TurnPlayerTo(int,int) location: class client TurnPlayerTo(EnemyX, EnemyY); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

And this is the client.java part.

if(AutoCast.isMultiCast[AutoCast_SpellIndex] == 0) { hitDiff = misc.random(AutoCast.MageHit[AutoCast_SpellIndex]); } TurnPlayerTo(EnemyX, EnemyY); addSkillXP(100 * hitDiff, playerMagic); addSkillXP(50 * hitDiff, playerHitpoints); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; // Updates server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].RandomWalk = false; server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].IsUnderAttack = true; server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].hitDiff = hitDiff; server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].Killing[playerId] += hitDiff; server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].updateRequired = true; server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].hitUpdateRequired = true; return true; } } }

Read full topic
